attributes.review: This app doesn’t even work. It crashed my phone 5 times. I can’t believe this. What a waste of time and space. Just throw the whole app away.
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: Does that is the worst I’ve ever had in my entire life it’s literally horrifying it is scary is against everything I have ever seen in my entire life Trump is absolute disgusting they should not be on the app.
attributes.title: Disgusting

attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw a SCARY Oompa Loompa on the front with corn fluff hair and I had a heart attack because it was so scary and I went to the hospital and a sexy elephant liver greeted me and said IMPEACH TRUMP an then I died from the heart attack so I would give this a solid 1 outta 5
attributes.title: Hate it✨💞🧚🤍☺️🌺

attributes.review: I just wanted to keep up with what the greatest president ever is up to but the app kept glitching freezing and shutting down my phone. I expect more from the greatest president ever
attributes.title: It's too glitchy

attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking it was going to be exciting about trump but as soon as I opened the app some trump supporter attacked me and cut my balls off so I hate this app and I think it should be taken out the App Store right away.!!
attributes.title: #NOTRUMP

attributes.review: This app is the worst app in the app store it is insane how they actually did this I hate Trump he is a racisist liar and looks like he dumped hot sauce all over himself I am part of the BLM and the LGBTQ so this is not a good app for me and I am pretty sure not a great app for anyone period boo
attributes.title: Trump hater

attributes.review: This app made my phone crash so hard I thought it had a sugar high. I downloaded this app and I saw the scariest thing in my life. I almost went into cardiac arrest. It was an Oompa Loompa with the most Cheeto like skin, and it looked like literal dog droppings. Send ✨help✨
attributes.title: ✨SOS✨

attributes.review: I’m not one to mess around when leaving reviews because this is only my second one. But this is app should have never been here to begin with.
attributes.title: This is dumb

attributes.review: This app is absolutely awful. It’s got tons of bugs and mistakes. This was definitely not worth my time to download and I will forever remember this when thinking of trump.
attributes.title: AWFUL.

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it took a hole week to download then it hacked all my personal info then it wouldn’t even let me get in the app. And now I can’t delete it!
attributes.title: Why do people like this
